document_data.name: Royal Treasury
document_data.mainbody: The '''Royal Treasury''' of [[Cormyr]] held the wealth of [[Suzail]] and the entire nation.
document_data.Location: The treasury was located directly beneath [[Castle Obarskyr]].
document_data.Defenses: The Royal Treasury was rumored to be heavily warded with [[magic]], [[trap]]s, and monstrous guardians.
